entries.waypoint_description_1: . Many looted items find themselves here before inspection.
entries.player_sorry: No. Not yet. I am still looking. I would still like to know...
entries.player_reset: No. I decided to stop looking. Wonder why?
entries.player_3_1: What did Jabba do to you?
entries.player_2_1: No thanks. I don't like messing with Jabba.
entries.npc_reset: 'Cause you don't have a spine, that's why! You're just like that * hic * slug! Why don't you come back here when you get some courage, eh? You can get some from the cantina like me, in case you don't know where * hic * to get it.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Yeah, I though you did. Let me see your datapad, yeah.. it's over * hic * here somewhere. You can meet me out there and we'll take all of his loot! I'll let * hic * you have half the stuff. Heyyyy... what are best friends for, eh?
entries.npc_4_1: What did he do to me?! WHAT DID HE * hic * DO TO ME?! He... erm... he went ahead and... er... I don't * hic * know anymore. It doesn't matter! He needs to be set straight! And taking all his stuff will show him who's the master, right! Wanna know where he keeps the stuff?
entries.npc_3_1: 'Cause you don't have a spine, that's why! You're just like that * hic * slug! Why don't you come back here when you get some courage, eh? You can get some from the cantina like me, in case you don't know where * hic * to get it.
entries.npc_2_1: Yeah, I thought you did. Let me see your datapad yeah.. it's over * hic * here somewhere. You can meet me out there and we'll take all of his loot! I'll let * hic * you have half the stuff. Heyyyy.... what are best friends for, eh?
entries.npc_1_1: Hic * Hey, you wanna help a guy out? I'm gonna go show that Jabba that he can't push me around anymore. I know where he keeps all his stuff hidden away, and I'm * hic* goin' there to take it from him. I bet you wanna know where it is, don't you?
